original_text: And he wrought evil in the sight of the Lord; but not like his father, and like his mother: for he put away the image of Baal that his father had made.
korean_text: 그가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으나 그의 부모와 같이 하지는 아니하였으니 이는 그가 그의 아버지가 만든 바알의 주상을 없이하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And he wrought evil in the sight of the Lord;
but not like his father, and like his mother:
for he put away the image of Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 그의 아버지가 만든 바알의 형상을 제거하였음이라
